mapper.select: SELECT bc.id , bc.email , bc.password , gu.mobile_phone AS phone , gu.name AS userName , gu.organization_code AS organizationCode , o.name AS orgName FROM groupware.basic_account bc JOIN groupware.user gu ON gu.id = bc.user_id JOIN organization o ON o.code = gu.organization_code WHERE bc.email = #{email}
